paragraphs.body: Hiroshi's airfield consisted of a large hangar for storing airplanes and mecha tanks, as well as at least one small prison cell and five individual airstrips radiating from the main hangar. There were also three smaller buildings located behind the main hangar. The entire compound was surrounded by an invisible electric fence that would electrocute anything upon contact. The airfield was situated on private property owned by Hiroshi Sato, located in canyons near Republic City.
